Steven Spielberg's fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey(n)

programme.title: Extraction
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is kidnapped by a terrorist organisation. His son, a government analyst turned down for field service, defies his superiors to mount his own rescue mission. He finds himself battling international assassins and top secret agents to save his father and prevent a terror attack. Action thriller, starring Kellan Lutz, Bruce Willis and Gina Carano

programme.title: K-Shop
programme.desc: A Bournemouth takeaway owner despairs of his drunken, abusive customers and is finally pushed to the limit when his father is killed in a violent altercation. He begins murdering the people who make his life a misery, and disposes of the bodies by making them into kebabs. Horror, starring Reece Noi and Ewen MacIntosh

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet

programme.title: Reckless
programme.desc: A married federal prosecutor stands poised on the brink of a bright future in politics. Everything starts to unravel when he hires an escort for the night. The experience ignites an uncontrollable sex addiction, and as his career blossoms, he faces a constant challenge hiding his actions from the media and his ambitious wife. Drama, starring Patrick Wilson, Lena Headey, Ray Winstone and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: Fugitives
programme.desc: A couple head to the Bahamas, hoping to revive their flagging marriage, but are soon fighting for their lives after being hunted by modern day pirates. Thriller, starring Dominic Purcell, Tricia Helfer and Luke Mably

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: The FBI agent who first captured Hannibal Lecter is called out of retirement to catch a demented murderer dubbed the Tooth Fairy, who slaughters a family whenever there is a full moon - forcing the detective to draw on the imprisoned cannibal's expertise in criminal psychology. Thriller prequel adapted from the first of Thomas Harris's Lecter novels, starring Anthony Hopkins, Edward Norton, Ralph Fiennes and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: CIA agent Roger Ferris hatches a bold but dangerous plan to capture terrorist Al-Saleem. With the help of Ed Hoffman who is a master of subterfuge, Ferris creates a fake terrorist organization to prompt Al-Saleem out of hiding. Spy thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Russell Crowe

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A chance encounter with an old friend derails a successful lawyer's fast-track career, plunging him headlong into a deadly game of cat and mouse with relentless government agents capable of anticipating his every move. He quickly realises the only way to save his own life is to expose the truths his pursuers seem so intent on covering up, and seeks out a former intelligence agent to take them on at their own game. Thriller, starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Lisa Bonet

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford

programme.title: Follow
programme.desc: A young man gets a strange Christmas gift from his girlfriend, blacks out and then wakes up the next day to find his life crumbling around him. Horror, starring Noah Segan, Haley Lu Richardson and Don Most

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: Mojave
programme.desc: A suicidal artist drives into the desert seeking solitude, hoping to find some meaning in his shallow life. He meets a mysterious drifter who throws his life off course, and must find a way to conquer his depression in order to protect the things he cares about. Thriller, starring Oscar Isaac, Garrett Hedlund and Mark Wahlberg

programme.title: Mercury Plains
programme.desc: A troubled teenager runs away from home and crosses the border into Mexico. He is recruited by a mysterious paramilitary organisation, that battles against drug cartels, supposedly in the pursuit of law and order, while actually stealing from the criminals. As the group's actions grow more violent, he searches for a way to escape with his life. Action adventure, starring Scott Eastwood, Angela Sarafyan and Andy Garcia

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: A hard-drinking sheriff and his deputy are pitted against a sadistic cartel hitman. Crime thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Ian McShane and John Leguizamo

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A stranded motorist is desperate when his wife disappears without a trace on a road trip - and the reluctance of the locals to help convinces him something sinister is going on. When it turns out that she has been abducted by a crazed trucker and his cronies, he is determined to set her free and make sure the villains pay for their crime. Thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Kathleen Quinlan, JT Walsh, MC Gainey, Jack Noseworthy and Rex Linn

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: A Texan hunter who took a stash of money abandoned at the site of a botched drug deal is pursued across the state by an implacable hitman with no qualms about killing anyone who gets in his way. Meanwhile, a world-weary sheriff struggles to make sense of the escalating chain of violence. The Coen brothers' Oscar-winning crime thriller, starring Josh Brolin, Javier Bardem, Tommy Lee Jones, Kelly Macdonald and Woody Harrelson

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon

programme.title: Desierto
programme.desc: A group of immigrants hoping to make it across the US-Mexico border are targeted by a deranged, gun-wielding vigilante. Thriller, starring Gael Garcia Bernal and Jeffrey Dean Morgan

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: A Texan hunter who took a stash of money abandoned at the site of a botched drug deal is pursued across the state by an implacable hitman with no qualms about killing anyone who gets in his way. Meanwhile, a world-weary sheriff struggles to make sense of the escalating chain of violence. The Coen brothers' Oscar-winning crime thriller, starring Josh Brolin, Javier Bardem, Tommy Lee Jones, Kelly Macdonald and Woody Harrelson(n)

programme.title: Salt and Fire
programme.desc: Scientists investigating rare geological formations in Bolivia are abducted by a rogue businessman. Eco-thriller from director Werner Herzog, starring Michael Shannon, Veronica Ferres and Gael Garcia Bernal(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos(n)

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A founding member of a secret society of assassins struggles to cope, as memories of his past misdeeds cause panic attacks and his family starts to fall apart. When he breaks down during the torture of a captive, his employers fear he is no longer reliable - and threaten the lives of his wife and daughter. Action thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and James Cosmo(n)

programme.title: Strangerland
programme.desc: A couple move to a remote town in the Australian Outback, but their new life takes a tragic turn when their teenage children disappear during a dust storm. As the townsfolk mount a search, tension and suspicion rise and public opinion quickly turns against the parents. Thriller, starring Nicole Kidman, Joseph Fiennes and Hugo Weaving(n)

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Brown's novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette(n)

programme.title: Extortion
programme.desc: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a ruthless fisherman, and races against the clock to save his wife and son. Drama, starring Eion Bailey, Bethany Joy Lenz and Barkhad Abdi(n)

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Brown's novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Smuggler Danny Archer ends up in prison in war-torn Sierra Leone in 1999, where he meets Solomon, a Mende fisherman separated from his family by guerrillas. Danny pledges to help the desperate man rescue his son, who has been forcibly conscripted as a child soldier, in return for a rare pink diamond that Solomon had hidden away before his capture. Action thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou and Jennifer Connelly(n)

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: A German tank commander is assigned to lead a surprise counter-attack against Allied forces as part of a last-ditch attempt to turn the tide of the Second World War and prevent the invasion of his country. An American intelligence officer realises what the enemy is planning, and tries to convince his superiors that they are facing a major offensive. Drama, starring Robert Shaw, Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Telly Savalas and Charles Bronson

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama recounting the bombing of Pearl Harbour from both the Japanese and American perspectives, reconstructing the events leading up to the devastating attack on the US naval base in 1941. Starring Martin Balsam, So Yamamura, Joseph Cotten, James Whitmore and Jason Robards

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A naval nurse falls in love with a French plantation owner on an American-held island during the Second World War. However, dark secrets surface from his past and result in her having to leave the colony and embark on a perilous mission with the help of a US Navy officer. Romantic musical based on the Rodgers and Hammerstein Broadway show, with Mitzi Gaynor, Rossano Brazzi, John Kerr and Ray Walston

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: An enigmatic British Army officer tries to unite the Arab nations against the Turks during the First World War, but comes into conflict with the military authorities when he engages the enemy with guerrilla tactics instead of more conventional methods. However, his increasingly torn loyalties leave him close to madness. Oscar-winning epic drama directed by David Lean, starring Peter O'Toole, Omar Sharif, Anthony Quinn, Alec Guinness and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: An upper-class soldier and his fellow officer stationed at Rorke's Drift in 1879 discover they have been cut off after the destruction of the main British army column in the area. They must rally their small force of 140 men against the might of 4,000 Zulu warriors advancing on their position. Fact-based historical drama, starring Michael Caine, Stanley Baker, Jack Hawkins, Ulla Jacobsson, Nigel Green and Chief Buthelezi, with narration by Richard Burton

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook assembles a motley gang to steal £4million in gold bullion from an Italian armoured car, which brings Turin to a standstill and enables the robbers to make a quick getaway in a fleet of Minis - but they end up falling foul of the Mafia along the way. Crime comedy, starring Michael Caine, Noel Coward, Benny Hill, Tony Beckley and John Le Mesurier

programme.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
programme.desc: A lawyer risks the wrath of his neighbours in a racially divided backwater in Alabama by agreeing to defend a black man on a rape charge. As he struggles to shield his son and daughter from the case's disturbing undertones, the children also have to confront their fear of a local recluse. Oscar-winning, Depression-era drama based on the classic novel by Harper Lee, starring Gregory Peck, Robert Duvall, Mary Badham and Phillip Alford

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson

programme.title: The Ox-Bow Incident
programme.desc: Cowboys intervene in a bid to prevent the lynching of three men accused of murdering a rancher and stealing his cattle. Western drama, starring Henry Fonda, Henry Morgan and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: A town marshal is torn between love and duty on his wedding day as he prepares for the arrival of a vengeful adversary on the midday train. Meanwhile, the townsfolk the marshal has so loyally protected are certain he will be killed in the confrontation and abandon him one by one to face his enemy alone. Western, starring Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Lloyd Bridges and Lee Van Cleef

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: A hard-working, small-town businessman comes to think his life has been a complete waste of time and tries to commit suicide. At the last minute, his guardian angel pays him a visit and makes him realise his true worth by showing him what would have happened to those around him had he never been born. Fantasy drama, starring James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Henry Travers, Beulah Bondi, Thomas Mitchell and Frank Faylen

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: A hard-working, small-town businessman comes to think his life has been a complete waste of time and tries to commit suicide. At the last minute, his guardian angel pays him a visit and makes him realise his true worth by showing him what would have happened to those around him had he never been born. Fantasy drama, starring James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Henry Travers, Beulah Bondi, Thomas Mitchell and Frank Faylen

programme.title: Cool Hand Luke
programme.desc: A rebellious small-time crook is sent to a prison in the Deep South, where he becomes a hero in the eyes of his fellow convicts and a thorn in the sides of the warden and the guards by refusing to bow to authority. His defiance escalates when he receives news of his mother's death, and embarks on a series of failed escape attempts. Drama based on Donn Pearce's novel, starring Paul Newman, George Kennedy, JD Cannon and Dennis Hopper

programme.title: The Hustler
programme.desc: An arrogant pool shark challenges a renowned champion player, only to lose the match and end up broke with his confidence shattered. With the aid of a cut-throat manager, he sets about honing his skills for a rematch - but making it to the top could cost him everything. Oscar-winning drama, starring Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, George C Scott, Piper Laurie, Murray Hamilton and Myron McCormick(n)

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman(n)

programme.title: Samson and Delilah
programme.desc: Hebrew warrior Samson becomes a wanted man after crossing paths with Philistine troops, but he constantly thwarts their efforts to capture him using to his incredible strength. Determined to bring him down, the Saran of Gaza makes use of his beguiling sister Delilah, who seduces Samson and manages to rob him of the source of his power. Cecil B DeMille's Oscar-winning adaptation of the biblical tale, starring Victor Mature, Hedy Lamarr, George Sanders, Angela Lansbury and Henry Wilcox(n)

programme.title: Arrowhead
programme.desc: A cavalry scout witnesses a series of raids by an Apache tribe that is supposedly in peace talks - but his superiors reject his story out of hand and dismiss him from duty. Continuing to spy on the tribe, he comes to suspect the chief's son is behind the attacks. Western, starring Charlton Heston, Jack Palance and Katy Jurado(n)

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's daughter falls for her father's playboy employer, but when he rejects her she flees to Paris. On her return, however, he is smitten by the alluring woman she has become - even though he is about to be married. To ensure the wedding takes place, his older brother decides to woo the beauty himself. Comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, William Holden, Humphrey Bogart and Walter Hampden(n)

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim(n)

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit in Chicago, two male jazz musicians don drag and hide out with an all-girl band to evade the gangsters pursuing them. However, the pair struggle to disguise their attraction for the beautiful lead singer - while one of them catches the eye of a smitten millionaire. Billy Wilder's classic romantic comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Tony Curtis and Marilyn Monroe(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: A German tank commander is assigned to lead a surprise counter-attack against Allied forces as part of a last-ditch attempt to turn the tide of the Second World War and prevent the invasion of his country. An American intelligence officer realises what the enemy is planning, and tries to convince his superiors that they are facing a major offensive. Drama, starring Robert Shaw, Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Telly Savalas and Charles Bronson(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough(n)

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone(n)

programme.title: Bunny and the Bull
programme.desc: A man suffering from agoraphobia is unable to leave his flat. When his food runs out, he is forced to contemplate rejoining the outside world and starts to relive the events of a traumatic holiday he spent travelling across Europe with his lecherous former best friend, which led to his current condition. Comedy, starring Edward Hogg, Simon Farnaby and Veronia Echegui

programme.title: Judy Moody and the Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: A girl looking forward to the summer holidays is faced with a boring break when she realises her friends are going away. However, the future brightens up when she goes to stay with her eccentric aunt and embarks on a series of manic adventures. Comedy based on Megan McDonald's series of children's books, starring Jordana Beatty and Heather Graham(c)

programme.title: Carol Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara and director Todd Haynes talk about making the 1950s-set romantic drama(c)

programme.title: Fast Girls
programme.desc: A fierce rivalry develops between a talented working class sprinter and the wealthy daughter of a former Olympic medal-winner as they compete on the track. They are forced to settle their differences and work together when they are recruited for the same relay team. Drama, with Lenora Crichlow, Lily James, Rupert Graves and Noel Clarke, who also co-wrote the script

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: A river of molten lava spews from an erupting volcano onto the streets of Los Angeles, prompting the head of a crisis agency to team up with an intrepid scientist in a frantic and dangerous bid to save the city's residents. Disaster thriller, starring Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche, Gaby Hoffmann, Keith David and Don Cheadle

programme.title: The Return of the Musketeers
programme.desc: D'Artagnan reunites his former companions to save the queen of France from the scheming Cardinal Mazarin, and embark on a mission to England to prevent the beheading of Charles I. Meanwhile, the daughter of a former vanquished enemy is seeking revenge on the four heroes. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, with Oliver Reed, Michael York, Frank Finlay, Richard Chamberlain, Kim Cattrall and Roy Kinnear, who died during filming

programme.title: X-Men
programme.desc: Super-powered outsiders Rogue and Wolverine find themselves at a school for mutants which is run by a benevolent psychic professor. While there, they agree to join others with similar gifts to take on a superhuman mutant terrorist faction intent on establishing dominance over mankind. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Anna Paquin and Halle Berry

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent D'Onofrio

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: A woman, her daughter and a couple are lost on the streets during a dangerous annual night when all laws are suspended. A gun-toting loner comes to their aid and fights to protect them, while also plotting to take advantage of the situation to pursue a murderous mission of his own. Horror sequel, starring Frank Grillo and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: A Dark Song
programme.desc: A grieving woman hires an occultist who claims he can put her in contact with her dead son. Psychological horror, starring Catherine Walker and Steve Oram

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: A man who longs to be a musician instead of a bullfighter like his father has to compete with a childhood friend when they fall for the same woman. Their love triangle catches the eye of the spirits of the dead, leading him on a journey through their bizarre world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana and Channing Tatum(c)

programme.title: Carol Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara and director Todd Haynes talk about making the 1950s-set romantic drama(c)

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of the US president is determined to lead a normal life and manages to persuade him to let her enrol at college as a normal student. However, she is unaware her father has hired a young special agent to go undercover at the same college - which creates a dilemma when she falls in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Katie Holmes, Marc Blucas, Michael Keaton and Amerie

programme.title: Carol Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara and director Todd Haynes talk about making the 1950s-set romantic drama

programme.title: The Train
programme.desc: As the Allies look set to liberate Paris from the Nazi forces, the Germans resolve to take all they can from the city - and plot to transport national treasures back to Berlin. However, bold French Resistance forces vow to stop them, enlisting the help of a train inspector along the way. Second World War adventure, starring Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield, Jeanne Moreau and Michel Simon

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: An archer fighting in Richard the Lionheart's crusading army returns home to England and assumes the identity of a nobleman killed in battle. His new-found status draws him into a dangerous conflict with members of the newly crowned King John's court, and a traitorous knight plots to aid the French in conquering England. Ridley Scott's medieval adventure, starring Russell Crowe, Cate Blanchett and Mark Strong

programme.title: Carol Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara and director Todd Haynes talk about making the 1950s-set romantic drama

programme.title: Thor
programme.desc: The Norse god of thunder is banished from his own world when his arrogance puts the kingdom on the brink of war. He is sent to present-day Earth, where he is forced to live among humans without his supernatural powers, but must regain his abilities to defend his new home against his evil brother. Kenneth Branagh's fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comics, starring Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston and Anthony Hopkins

programme.title: Love Is Strange
programme.desc: Premiere. Two middle-aged gay men who have been living together for years finally tie the knot. Instead of living happily ever after, their marriage is put to the test when one of them loses his teaching job, forcing them to downsize their apartment and find a new place to live - a task that proves to be easier said than done. Drama, starring Alfred Molina and John Lithgow

programme.title: Mindscape
programme.desc: A psychic with the ability to explore people's memories uses his talents to aid the police, until a case goes disastrously wrong. Desperate for work, he agrees to help a wealthy couple discover why their teenage daughter is on a hunger strike, but beings to fear she is manipulating her memories to deceive him. Fantasy thriller, starring Mark Strong, Taissa Farmiga and Brian Cox(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: Documentary that explores what life is like for deaf people living on the remote Scottish Islands(n)

programme.title: The Lawless Breed
programme.desc: A gunslinger newly released from prison tells the story of his eventful life to a newspaper reporter in the hope of salvaging his brutal reputation. Fact-based Western, starring Rock Hudson and Julie Adams(n)

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Soldiers escaping the American Civil War take flight in a giant observation balloon and land far away on a strange uncharted island, where they encounter giant creatures, cut-throat pirates, two shipwrecked Englishwomen - and the mysterious Captain Nemo. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Michael Craig, Herbert Lom, Joan Greenwood and Michael Callan, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen(n)

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: An ageing hard-bitten rancher expects his two sons to follow in his footsteps and keep order in their lawless land with the force of the gun. One of his boys is a gentle soul with no appetite for violence, but his brother is trigger-happy and one day takes a step too far - leaving his father with an impossible decision. Western, starring Van Heflin, Tab Hunter and James Darren(n)

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: A Second World War submarine captain tries to restore his crippled vessel to its former glory, but is thwarted by his first officer, who has invited a party of nurses, children and an expectant mother on board. Mayhem ensues as the skipper struggles to rein in the female influence on ship protocol. Comedy, starring Cary Grant, Tony Curtis and Joan O'Brien(n)

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen 2
programme.desc: Tom and Kate Baker and their 12 children are enjoying a summer holiday together at their lakeside cabin before the last of the kids flies the nest. All is well until Tom realises arch-rival Jimmy Murtaugh and his family are staying nearby, and even though the youngsters are having fun, the fathers succumb to increasingly frequent displays of one-upmanship. Comedy sequel, with Steve Martin, Eugene Levy, Bonnie Hunt and Hilary Duff(n)

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The chauvinistic host of a top-rated American news programme in 1970s San Diego fights for his status and job security when both are threatened by the arrival of an ambitious female reporter, whose determination to become a newsreader leads to a bitter battle of the sexes. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Fred Willard and Steve Carell(n)

programme.title: The Watch
programme.desc: A small-town supermarket manager organises a neighbourhood watch group to patrol his community after a suspicious death, but finds the only recruits he can gather do not take the job seriously. They soon face a greater threat than crime when they uncover a secret alien invasion going on under their noses. Sci-fi comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn, Jonah Hill and Richard Ayoade(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa wins a raffle, but Grandma is upset to learn that his prize is a statue that reminds him of one of his ex-girlfriends. Meanwhile, John-Boy writes a story about the failed romance between Miss Emily and Ashley Longworth

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben tries to win the attention of a special girl, but his attempts backfire miserably as she goes running into the arms of Jason

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Adam and Mary Kendall return to Walnut Grove to set up a law practice. However, their first client proves controversial with the neighbours

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caroline convinces herself she is going to have another baby, but Doc Baker tells her she is clutching at straws and will never have any more children. To cheer her up, Charles arranges for them to renew their wedding vows. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Twice Upon a Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's good daughter prepares to give up her immortal life for love, but does not count on the scheming of her evil sister, who is planning to turn their homeland into a massive gambling resort. Festive drama sequel, starring Kathy Ireland, John Dye and Arturo Gill

programme.title: Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus
programme.desc: The son of a hard-working single mother writes a letter to Father Christmas asking for a new dad. By coincidence, Santa is poised to hand over his global toy-distributing duties to his son Nick - who will only be able to take over the family business when he finds himself a wife. Comedy, starring Crystal Bernard, Steve Guttenberg, Dominic Scott Kay and Cody Arens

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A woman meets her fiance's parents for the first time just before Christmas, and is amazed to discover they are Santa Claus and his wife. While the experience restore her childhood love of Christmas, her cynical father is determined to stop her going through with the wedding. Comedy, with George Wendt, Shelley Long ad Kassia Warshawski

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Two children discover a sack full of money at the local mall and head off on a festive spending spree. However, the crooks who counterfeited the cash are soon hot on their heels. Family comedy, starring Patrick Swayze, Matthew Knight, Amy and Zoe Schlagel, Tim Curry and Carmen Electra

programme.title: The Three Gifts
programme.desc: Three mischievous orphans spend the Christmas season with a childless couple while the home they live in is renovated. They learn their hosts are considering adopting a single youngster, causing rivalry to erupt between the kids - but the husband is not sure he is ready for fatherhood. Festive drama, starring Dean Cain and Jean Louisa Kelly

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper tries to make her new client get into the holiday spirit and spend more time with his young son. Comedy drama, starring Meredith Hagner, Travis Milne and Anna Van Hooft

programme.title: A Town Without Christmas
programme.desc: A sensitive youngster writes a letter to Santa Claus asking to be taken away from his battling parents so they can rebuild their crumbling relationship - prompting a reporter and a novelist to team up and track down the troubled child. Drama, starring Peter Falk, Patricia Heaton and Isabella Fink

programme.title: Borrowed Hearts
programme.desc: A ruthless factory boss pays a hard-up employee to pose as his wife, hoping to impress a mysterious colleague - an arrangement with unexpected consequences for all concerned. Romantic drama, starring Roma Downey, Eric McCormack and Shawn Thompson

programme.title: Oh Christmas Tree
programme.desc: A woman who has always hated Christmas is forced to take over running her father's struggling tree lot when he breaks his leg. Helping people find the perfect decoration for their homes inspires a newfound love of the season and she starts to fall for a repeat customer - but she also has to save the business from closure. Romantic comedy, with Sarah Lancaster and Eric Johnson

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: As John and Olivia make plans for their 20th wedding anniversary, eldest som John-Boy falls in love with an older woman - and decides to leave the mountain with her

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is rushed to hospital with pneumonia, leaving the rest of the family to cope with their financial hardship

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Charles and Albert go on a delivery run and meet the Cooper family. Whilst tackling a steep hill, Alvin loses control of his wagon leading to a tragic accident. Charles later sends two children to live in a distant orphanage, but then begins to have doubts about what he's done

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Cassandra and James run away from their new adoptive father, who's so indifferent to their welfare that he doesn't even bother to look for them. Fortunately, they eventually end up back at the Ingalls household, where Charles comes up with a solution to their plight

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper tries to make her new client get into the holiday spirit and spend more time with his young son. Comedy drama, starring Meredith Hagner, Travis Milne and Anna Van Hooft

programme.title: The Three Gifts
programme.desc: Three mischievous orphans spend the Christmas season with a childless couple while the home they live in is renovated. They learn their hosts are considering adopting a single youngster, causing rivalry to erupt between the kids - but the husband is not sure he is ready for fatherhood. Festive drama, starring Dean Cain and Jean Louisa Kelly

programme.title: A Town Without Christmas
programme.desc: A sensitive youngster writes a letter to Santa Claus asking to be taken away from his battling parents so they can rebuild their crumbling relationship - prompting a reporter and a novelist to team up and track down the troubled child. Drama, starring Peter Falk, Patricia Heaton and Isabella Fink

programme.title: 3 Holiday Tails
programme.desc: A married couple retire to Florida with their golden retriever, and befriend their neighbour and her three puppies. When they discover that their new friend's lost love is about to marry someone else, they plot to bring them back together - with the help of the dogs. Romantic comedy sequel to A Golden Christmas, with Julie Gonzalo, KC Clyde, Bruce Davison and Alley Mills

programme.title: A Golden Christmas
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts bury a time capsule, with the help of their beloved dog. As adults, they both return to their home town looking for a fresh start and, not recognising one another, fall into an instant mutual dislike. It falls to another dog to remind them of the past and bring them back together. Romantic comedy, with Andrea Roth and Nicholas Brendon

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Table
programme.desc: Family friends Sam and Kat grew up on together, spending every Christmas Eve at the children's table. They have shared the highs and lows of early adulthood, but as he grows older Sam begins to realise the affection may be more deeper than he had imagined. Drama, starring Danica McKellar, Dustin Milligan and Lea Thompson

programme.title: Lovely, Still at Christmas
programme.desc: A lonely old man working a grocery shop returns home shortly before Christmas to find a strange woman in his house. This awkward first encounter leads to the lifelong bachelor falling in love for the first time. Romantic drama, with Martin Landau, Ellen Burstyn, Adam Scott and Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: A Star for Christmas
programme.desc: A baker's life is thrown into chaos by a recent break-up and her co-worker leaving her to cope alone during a busy period. Things look up when she falls in love with a handsome customer, but does not realise he is a movie star in town to shoot a film. Meanwhile, her ex-boyfriend is less than happy about her new romance. Festive drama, starring Briana Evigan and Corey Sevier

programme.title: Holiday High School Reunion
programme.desc: When a woman learns of her high school reunion a week before Christmas, she is ecstatic to finally have her chance to win back the 'one that got away'. Comedy, starring Rachel Boston, Jonathan Bennett and Jon Prescott

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy must stand in for the town minister while he is away on honeymoon, but fears he has nothing profound to say(n)

programme.desc: A lawyer returns to his home town at Christmas to find his high-school rival is now the mayor and has grand plans for a public nativity display. He decides to try and oust his old enemy from office, while also organising a campaign to put a stop to the community's traditional festive celebrations. Comedy drama, with Daniel Baldwin and Ted McGinley(n)

programme.title: Our First Christmas
programme.desc: A newlywed couple with children from previous marriages long to spend their first Christmas together as one big, happy family. However, the two different sets of siblings are set in their ways and refuse to surrender their customary yuletide traditions. Drama, starring Julie Warner, Steven Eckholdt, Katerina Graham, Dixie Carter and Carly Bondar

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa wins a raffle, but Grandma is upset to learn that his prize is a statue that reminds him of one of his ex-girlfriends. Meanwhile, John-Boy writes a story about the failed romance between Miss Emily and Ashley Longworth

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben tries to win the attention of a special girl, but his attempts backfire miserably as she goes running into the arms of Jason

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Adam and Mary Kendall return to Walnut Grove to set up a law practice. However, their first client proves controversial with the neighbours

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caroline convinces herself she is going to have another baby, but Doc Baker tells her she is clutching at straws and will never have any more children. To cheer her up, Charles arranges for them to renew their wedding vows. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Twice Upon a Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's good daughter prepares to give up her immortal life for love, but does not count on the scheming of her evil sister, who is planning to turn their homeland into a massive gambling resort. Festive drama sequel, starring Kathy Ireland, John Dye and Arturo Gill

programme.title: Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus
programme.desc: The son of a hard-working single mother writes a letter to Father Christmas asking for a new dad. By coincidence, Santa is poised to hand over his global toy-distributing duties to his son Nick - who will only be able to take over the family business when he finds himself a wife. Comedy, starring Crystal Bernard, Steve Guttenberg, Dominic Scott Kay and Cody Arens

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A woman meets her fiance's parents for the first time just before Christmas, and is amazed to discover they are Santa Claus and his wife. While the experience restore her childhood love of Christmas, her cynical father is determined to stop her going through with the wedding. Comedy, with George Wendt, Shelley Long ad Kassia Warshawski

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Two children discover a sack full of money at the local mall and head off on a festive spending spree. However, the crooks who counterfeited the cash are soon hot on their heels. Family comedy, starring Patrick Swayze, Matthew Knight, Amy and Zoe Schlagel, Tim Curry and Carmen Electra

programme.title: The Three Gifts
programme.desc: Three mischievous orphans spend the Christmas season with a childless couple while the home they live in is renovated. They learn their hosts are considering adopting a single youngster, causing rivalry to erupt between the kids - but the husband is not sure he is ready for fatherhood. Festive drama, starring Dean Cain and Jean Louisa Kelly

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper tries to make her new client get into the holiday spirit and spend more time with his young son. Comedy drama, starring Meredith Hagner, Travis Milne and Anna Van Hooft

Romantic comedy, with Sarah Lancaster and Eric Johnson

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. programme.desc: Bridge, Eliza and Larry spend a day together searching for Bridge's towed car. Tutu has a manic episode(n)

programme.title: Occupy Fiona
programme.desc: Ian tests Fiona's patience and resolve by bringing a messy "Occupy Fiona" movement right to her front door. Lip struggles to get Professor Youens to court for his DUI trial. Meanwhile, a now unemployed Frank goes on a job hunt and Carl gets a feisty new rehab client with a plan to help him get the rest of his tuition(n)

Joel and Tess secure Charlie behind bars in the cellar after thwarting his second escape attempt. Paranoia convinces Joel that Detective Talbot is following him after an unexpected visit to Kira's and that the net is closing in(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Clarence Worley (CHRISTIAN SLATER) has very little romance in his life. He's a loner who works in a comic book shop, spends most of his spare hours watching old kung-fu movies in shabby local cinemas and is in his own world. Then Alabama (PATRICIA ARQUETTE) walks into the Lyric Theatre and changes that world forever. After a whirlwind courtship, Clarence commits a crime defending Alabama's honor. His noble act spins the couple onto a collision course with gangsters and police which takes them from Detroit to Los Angeles(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee(n)

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is(n)

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as a tough detective with a soft heart and a huge appetite for adventure. He faces the most picturesque gangsters ever to release crime on the streets of his city(n)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide(n)

programme.title: The Pianist
programme.desc: A brilliant pianist in Warsaw witnesses the restrictions Nazis place on Jews in the Polish capital during the occupation in World War II. His family is rounded up and forced to live in a ghetto, then later shipped off to the Nazi labor camps. He manages to escape deportation, with the help of some kind Polish citizens, and eludes capture by living in the ruins of Warsaw. There he struggles to stay alive even when cast away from those he loves(n)

Joel's divorce nets him a financial windfall and reunites him with Charlie and Tess, his best friends from college. Eager to get Joel back on track, Charlie sets him up with Nadia, a sexy and unpredictable doctor. Series premiere(n)

Joel rents a remote house and buys black market chemotherapy drugs for Charlie. Enlisting Tess, they kidnap Charlie and administer the chemo, but it's not as easy as they hoped - until Joel hires Nadia to be their live-in doctor(n)

Joel and Tess decide to keep a closer eye on Charlie after news of his disappearance and cancer diagnosis leaks online. So as not to arouse suspicion Joel decides he should visit Charlie's wife, Kira - but is that such a good idea?(n)

Joel continues to visit Kia - and finds himself enjoying taking on Charlie's role in this ready-made family. Meanwhile, back at the house, Charlie's increasingly intimate spiritual guru act convinces Nadia to try and clean herself up(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Mild Violence

programme.desc: Joel and Tess secure Charlie behind bars in the cellar after thwarting his second escape attempt. Paranoia convinces Joel that Detective Talbot is following him after an unexpected visit to Kira's and that the net is closing in(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought(n)

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: It's three days to the millennium and Satan (Gabriel Byrne) has come to New York looking for a bride. Arnold Schwarzenegger plays a down on his luck alcoholic cop who must protect the woman (Robin Tunney) that Satan picks

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic

programme.title: Time At The Top
programme.desc: A thirteen-year-old Philadelphia girl (Elisha Cuthbert) from the 20th Century travels through time with a couple of pals (Gabrielle Boni, Matthew Harbour) from the 19th Century in this family adventure with Timothy Busfield and Michael Sinelnikoff

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: For two centuries, Andrew, a popular robot model, learns all he might about the intricacies of humanity, life and love, and teaches as much as he learns. Through these efforts, he shows the world how to open its eyes and its heart to receive any being with enough compassion to ask for acceptance

programme.title: Southland Tales
programme.desc: On July 4, 2008, Los Angeles stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros is an action star stricken with amnesia. His life intertwines with Krysta Now, an adult film star developing her own reality television project, and David Clark, a Hermosa Beach police officer who holds the key to a vast conspiracy

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Seeking to exorcise the demons of a tragedy that still haunts her, an outdoorsy woman (Shauna Macdonald) and her five best friends spend a weekend spelunking in the Appalachian Mountains - but a wrong turn down a remote cave system lands them at the doorstep of strange, flesh-craving creatures. Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems

programme.title: Battle Royale
programme.desc: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students, and places them on a on a desert island where they are forced to fight each other to death or all of them will be killed

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno

programme.title: Urban Legend
programme.desc: A psychotic killer takes recreates the mythical "urban legends" that circulate through America's schools with flawless accuracy on a besieged college campus in this teen slasher flick. The all-star cast of this box office hit includes Alicia Witt, Tara Reid, Rebecca Gayheart, Jared Leto, Joshua Jackson, Loretta Devine, Robert Englund, John Neville, Natasha Wagner and Brad Dourif

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group's getaway into the woods dissolves into a full-throttle fight for their lives when unwelcome aliens invade

programme.title: Urban Legend
programme.desc: A psychotic killer takes recreates the mythical "urban legends" that circulate through America's schools with flawless accuracy on a besieged college campus in this teen slasher flick. The all-star cast of this box office hit includes Alicia Witt, Tara Reid, Rebecca Gayheart, Jared Leto, Joshua Jackson, Loretta Devine, Robert Englund, John Neville, Natasha Wagner and Brad Dourif

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress(n)

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife(n)

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster(n)

programme.title: Sexipede
programme.desc: A doctor tries to prove an unknown creature materializes inside human bodies during sex by romping with her until she can capture it(n)

programme.title: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: An eerie green ball magically transports the viewer into a series of adventures in the past, future, and into the world beyond. Included are stories of the space super heroine, Taarna; the hard-boiled exploits of Harry Canyon, cab driver of the future; and the adventures of "Den:' who the green ball changes from an introverted teen into a macho hero. Featuring the voices of John Candy, Harold Ramis, Eugene Levy and Joe Flaherty(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress(n)
