programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned(n)

programme.desc: Actor Lewis Stone sends Yuletide wishes to U.S. Armed Forces serving overseas during WWII

programme.desc: Miranda, a beautiful college professor, awakens from a blackout and is surrounded by dead bodies. She learns she is an alien/ human hybrid, and must travel to Mexico to find her creator before she can no longer contain her lethal urges. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Fact-based sports biopic stars Rob Brown as Syracuse University running back Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy as the outstanding college-football player. Dennis Quaid costars as Syracuse coach Ben Schwartzwalder. Directed by Gary Fleder. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: A restaging of the surprise Japanese attack against the backdrop of a love triangle involving a nurse and two fighter pilots. The film was nominated for three Oscars and won one for Best Sound Effects Editing. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent tries to infiltrate a powerful crime ring. But when a bust goes bad, he lands in the recently reopened, high-tech Alcatraz, where he remains undercover as thieves try to find a cache of stolen gold. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: Two suburban parents hire a new babysitter to look after their three kids while they enjoy a night out, but the sitter eventually reveals herself to be an unhinged imposter who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Species II
programme.desc: An ace astronaut plays host to an alien that shares a cosmic connection with Eve, a clone created by the government to gain an understanding of how to combat extra terrestrials. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: Four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mr. 3000
programme.desc: An arrogant baseball player leaves the game the moment he collects his 3000th hit, but, years later, when a statistical snafu is discovered and his total is lowered, the over-the-hill slugger must come out of retirement to reach the milestone and cement his place in baseball history. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Three teenagers are kidnapped and imprisoned by a man with multiple-personality disorder, and must plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas—young or old, male or female, benign or monstrous—they will confront on the way out. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: A Cuban refugee becomes a drug lord in Miami. Inspired by actual events. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: A young couple are terrorized by three masked intruders at a secluded country house. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Casanova
programme.desc: Tale of the amorous exploits of the suave 18th-century Venetian ladies' man whose womanizing ways are disrupted by an engaged cross-dressing feminist. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Tour de Pharmacy
programme.desc: Sports-doping spoof focusing on a fictional, world-class cycling event in 1982 that was marred by one controversy after another, as recalled by five riders, commentators, celebrities and other assorted ne'er-do-wells. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy
programme.desc: A Southern matron forges a bond with her black chauffeur in the racially-divided 1960s South. Only when he is retired and she is confined to a home for the elderly do the two fully realize that they've been friends and kindred spirits all along. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Batman v Superman Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Batman and Superman clash over differing philosophies about what kind of heroism is needed to protect the world, while the public they're defending is becoming increasingly mindful of the damage that superheroes and masked vigilantes cause. programme.title: Collateral Beauty

programme.title: Hamlet 2

programme.title: Mechanic Resurrection
programme.desc: Hit man Arthur Bishop is forced to come out of retirement and commit three difficult assassinations in order to rescue his kidnapped lover. The hardest part: He must make all of the killings look like accidents. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A dangerous sniper traps a self-centered NYC publicist in a public phone booth. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Take

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: When a Russian mobster creates a crooked real-estate deal, a potential fortune is waiting to be had, and every London thug tries to get a piece of the action. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: El Cantante

programme.title: Protocol
programme.desc: A ditzy cocktail waitress gets embroiled in Middle Eastern politics when she intervenes in an assassination attempt. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Sister Act

programme.title: Gran Torino

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums

programme.title: Down With Love
programme.desc: A feminist author has her ideals challenged by a big-shot journalist amongst the backdrop of early-1960s New York City. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: View from the Top

programme.title: John Wick Chapter 2

programme.title: Hostage

programme.title: Frost/Nixon

programme.title: Making of 'Deepwater Horizon'

programme.title: Abandon

programme.title: Hoosiers

programme.title: Marauders

programme.title: The Dark Knight

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: In this sequel to "Fifty Shades of Grey," the demure Anastasia Steele and possessive businessman Christian Grey pursue a more open and trusting relationship. However, their attempts are threatened by several of his past lovers. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: Murky religious thriller about a rebel priest (Heath Ledger) who uncovers a dark secret in the Catholic Church while investigating the mysterious death of his mentor. Shannyn Sossamon. Written and directed by Brian Helgeland. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Newspaperman The Life and Times of Ben Bradlee

programme.title: The Belko Experiment

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: After losing his driver's license, a bumbling cop teams up with a brassy cabbie so he can pursue a team of female bank robbers who are led by a beautiful Brazilian. (cc)

programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan. (cc)

programme.desc: A DEA agent investigates when a team of Army Rangers disappears in Panama. (cc)

programme.title: Within

programme.title: Undercover Brother

programme.title: Caught in the Crossfire
programme.desc: Chris Klein and Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson star in director Brian A. Miller's drama about two detectives who become the targets of both gangsters and crooked cops during an important investigation. (cc)

programme.title: Urban Cowboy
programme.desc: Popular country-western take on "Saturday Night Fever" about a good ol' boy looking for love from atop a mechanical bull in a Houston honky-tonk. Based on a magazine article by Aaron Latham, who co-wrote the script. (cc)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: A college dropout (Giovanni Ribisi) running an illegal gambling casino out of his Queens house is recruited to work for a shady brokerage firm that sells bogus stocks over the phone to unsuspecting customers. Seth's Mother: Donna Mitchell. Jeff: Jon Abrahams. Written and directed by Ben Younger. (cc)

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: This true-life football saga centers on Vince Papale, a 30-year-old sandlot player who earned a spot on the 1976 Philadelphia Eagles. In time, Papale becomes a special-teams star and fan favorite. (cc)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip. (cc)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by costars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined janitor who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist (Robin Williams, who also won an Oscar). (cc)

programme.title: Independence Day Resurgence
programme.desc: The nations of Earth band together to fight off a second alien invasion, 20 years after the first attack brought humanity to the brink of extinction. Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the alliance readies itself for a massive war. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Strange Days
programme.desc: On the eve of the millennium, a former cop hustles virtual-reality discs that can record any human experience---including murder. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Passenger 57
programme.desc: The cohorts of a ruthless terrorist hijack a plane to rescue him from an FBI escort, but they do not know that a terrorism expert is aboard. (cc)(n)

programme.title: A Bigger Splash
programme.desc: A rock star and her boyfriend find their vacation interrupted by an old flame of hers, a music producer who clearly wants to win her back. Meanwhile, the latter's daughter also appears eager to break up the couple. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two soul-singing brothers are sent on a "mission from God" to raise $5000 to save a Chicago orphanage. On their fund-raising tour de force, they encounter a multitude of mishaps and mayhem. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: A betrayed mob hit man goes the lam with his son, and seeks revenge against vicious gangsters. As the bullets start to fly, the impressionable child is exposed to the goriest aspects of his father's talents. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic future, the world has been besieged by intelligent, fire-breathing dragons. A survivalist and a military man clash as they lead one of the last few vestiges of humanity in an all-out war against the vicious prehistoric beasts. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Aviator

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: A kind of `Cosby' or `Father Knows Best' for the times, about a trucking-company executive, his wife and their three kids in suburban Connecticut. A steady performer for ABC, `Wife' ranges from issue-oriented to slapstick. It's very much the vision of star Damon Wayans (also a coexecutive producer), who based it in part on his own life, and frequently uses family members as actors, directors and screenwriters. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: Hity na czasie
programme.desc: Zestawienie najpopularniejszych utworów muzycznych i teledysków, które znajdują się na szczytach różnych list przebojów

W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: ESKA Music Awards 2016
programme.desc: Uroczysta gala wręczenia nagród w piętnastej edycji popularnego plebiscytu. W Szczecinie o wyróżnienia w siedmiu kategoriach, m.in. dla najlepszego hitu, radiowego debiutu, zespołu, artystki i artysty, rywalizować będą znani artyści. Na scenie w Azoty Arenie pojawią się polscy wokaliści, których utwory na przełomie 2015 i 2016 roku biły rekordy popularności, m.in. Margaret, Sylwia Grzeszczak, Ewelina Lisowska, Grzegorz Hyży, C-BooL, Sound'n'Grace oraz Video. Po raz pierwszy przed szczecińską widownią zaśpiewają debiutanci: Monika Lewczuk, Antek Smykiewicz i Szymon Chodyniecki. Gwiazdą wieczoru będzie norweski producent muzyczny Alan Walker, który wykona dwa przeboje: "Faded" oraz "Sing Me To Sleep". Towarzyszyć mu będzie piosenkarka Iselin Solheim

BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: Hity na czasie
programme.desc: Zestawienie najpopularniejszych utworów muzycznych i teledysków, które znajdują się na szczytach różnych list przebojów

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: ESKA Music Awards 2016
programme.desc: Uroczysta gala wręczenia nagród w piętnastej edycji popularnego plebiscytu. W Szczecinie o wyróżnienia w siedmiu kategoriach, m.in. dla najlepszego hitu, radiowego debiutu, zespołu, artystki i artysty, rywalizować będą znani artyści. Na scenie w Azoty Arenie pojawią się polscy wokaliści, których utwory na przełomie 2015 i 2016 roku biły rekordy popularności, m.in. Margaret, Sylwia Grzeszczak, Ewelina Lisowska, Grzegorz Hyży, C-BooL, Sound'n'Grace oraz Video. Po raz pierwszy przed szczecińską widownią zaśpiewają debiutanci: Monika Lewczuk, Antek Smykiewicz i Szymon Chodyniecki. Gwiazdą wieczoru będzie norweski producent muzyczny Alan Walker, który wykona dwa przeboje: "Faded" oraz "Sing Me To Sleep". Towarzyszyć mu będzie piosenkarka Iselin Solheim

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Albert
programme.desc: Of all the trees at Earth Mama's nursery, little Douglas fir tree Albert has the biggest ambition. He hopes to one day be the star of the show as the Christmas tree sitting at the heart of Empire City. As the festive season approaches, Albert set his mind to helping all the other plants at the nursery into the Christmas spirit. However, when a city-wide news bulletin announces the search for this year's tree, Albert spots a chance to live his dream, and sets out on a journey with help from his friends Maisie, a persistently positive palm tree, and Gene, a blisteringly honest weed. Festive animated adventure, with the voices of Bobby Moynihan, Sasheer Zamata and Judah Friedlander

programme.title: Albert
programme.desc: Of all the trees at Earth Mama's nursery, little Douglas fir tree Albert has the biggest ambition. He hopes to one day be the star of the show as the Christmas tree sitting at the heart of Empire City. As the festive season approaches, Albert set his mind to helping all the other plants at the nursery into the Christmas spirit. However, when a city-wide news bulletin announces the search for this year's tree, Albert spots a chance to live his dream, and sets out on a journey with help from his friends Maisie, a persistently positive palm tree, and Gene, a blisteringly honest weed. Festive animated adventure, with the voices of Bobby Moynihan, Sasheer Zamata and Judah Friedlander(n)

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Dawn of the Driscoll/Night of the Living McFizzles.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Madame X is no longer interested in capturing Billy, so he goes on a search for a new obsessed fan. Then, Spencer convinces his family to be on a reality show

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: A Place in the Sun/Copycat Cobra.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop decides to allow his pet to hatch his invasion plans as he never gets any credit for stopping him. Later, Kat wants to turn Bootsville Beach into a rubbish dump for the Kat Nebula

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. The pet's magnifier satellite causes a heatwave, and everyone is worried Old Lady Muson might wear her bikini. Feeling horrified, they plot to change the weather. Then, Coop and Dennis compete to reduce their carbon footprints

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy gets McFist thrown out of a cool resort. Then, Howard goes to the centre of the Earth to set the story straight about a lie he told

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Big Trouble in Little Norrisville/Winner Takes Ball.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy accidentally sends Howard on a quest for the final Sorcerer's Ball. Then, Randy and Howard plan to buy an exotic sweet, but end up with an ancient idol, a sorcerer's ball and big trouble

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster sneezes blue ink when he has a cold - and turns Alicia's drawings blue. Then, magic becomes Rafik's new hobby, but his audition attracts the attention of an evil, ambitious magician

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace is bedridden after injuring her ankle, so the boys try to make sure she does not get bored

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash
programme.desc: Part one of two. Hulk finds himself torn between the Avengers and the Agents of Smash

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.sub-title: Stuck in the Metal with You.

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: The Freemakers meet Hondo, who gives them a seemingly simple job that turns out to be much harder than they thought

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: The Freemakers are in hot pursuit of the remaining Kyber Saber Crystals, but each time they find one, Naare steals it away

programme.title: DuckTales
programme.desc: Huey, Dewey and Louie, along with Mrs. Beakley's granddaughter, Webby, discover long-kept family secrets from Scrooge's epic past, sending the family on escapades around the world

programme.title: Walk Behind the Prank

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: Ant-Man and Black Panther set out to prevent stop Baron Zemo from obtaining a powerful mystery object from Wakanda

programme.title: Marvel's Spider-Man
programme.desc: Kraven the Hunter does a live broadcast of his hunt for Spider-Man. Spidey and Kid Arachnid have to defeat the villain before he can deliver them to Norman Osborn

programme.title: Marvel's Spider-Man

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series
programme.sub-title: Big Hero 6: The Series: Baymax Returns.
programme.desc: Baymax, the lovable inflatatble high-tech hero of hit movie Big Hero 6, returns in his very own series of adventures set immediately after the events of the film. programme.title: Unlocking the Mech
programme.desc: New series. Compilation of shorts featuring characters fighting robots and monsters, as well as showcasing new features of the Mech, and new gadgets like Mech-Links and X-Goggles

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force
programme.desc: After Skylar fills in as mission leader, Chase sets out to prove that he is the only team member equipped for the role. Perry moves into mission command

programme.title: Milo Murphy's Law

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Phineas and Ferb Interrupted/A Real Boy.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Mommy Can You Hear Me?/Road Trip.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys try to stop Candace from getting bored when she is bedridden after injuring her ankle. Then, they build a diner on top of their caravan while on a road trip

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.desc: Chase finds he has a secret ability - telekinesis, or moving things with his mind. Meanwhile, Marcus spies on the Lab Rats, then hands a video to a mysterious man

programme.title: Mech-X4
programme.desc: As Harris' experiment at the science fair goes haywire with potentially explosive consequences, the school's MECH-X4 fan club threatens to reveal Ryan's secret identity

programme.title: Star vs the Forces of Evil
programme.desc: When Marco is captured by Toffee and held for wand-ransom, Star enters into an unlikely alliance with Ludo and Buff Frog

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Mommy Can You Hear Me?/Road Trip.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys try to stop Candace from getting bored when she is bedridden after injuring her ankle. Then, they build a diner on top of their caravan while on a road trip

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: That's the Spirit/The Curse of Candace.
programme.desc: Double bill of Halloween episodes. With the voices of Michael Douglas and son Dylan, Michael J Fox and True Blood stars Anna Paquin and Stephen Moyer

programme.title: Walk the Prank
programme.desc: The latest lough-out-loud pranks include the team staging a pet adoption with a wild-stuffed puppy and a fake cereal commercial that leaves an actor rethinking his career

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure based on the movie saga, following a band of heroes fighting back against the evil Galactic Empire

programme.title: Walk Behind the Prank
programme.desc: A look behind the scenes at the pranks to see how the pranksters make them work

programme.title: Milo Murphy's Law
programme.desc: Double bill. Sara wants to see The Doctor Zone Files movie with Milo, but worries about potential problems. Then, Milo and the gang spend the day chasing after his doctor's note

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys search for evidence that a mythical monster exists. Then, Isabella's plans for a quiet birthday are disrupted when the gang throws her a huge party

programme.title: Walk the Prank
programme.desc: A team of teenagers perpetrates a series of hidden camera pranks on adults

programme.title: Mech-X4
programme.desc: When our heroes break into a hi-tech lab to discover the secrets behind the monsters, Ryan comes face to face with the deadly creator of the beasts

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.desc: Leo records Adam and Chase doing crazy bionic stunts in the lab on his new phone. The phone is about to be launched to the public, so they must wipe the incriminating evidence. Teen sci-fi comedy following the exploits of Leo Dooley, a high school student who discovers his eccentric step-father has been looking after a trio of super-powered youngsters

programme.title: Milo Murphy's Law
programme.desc: When Cavendish and Dakota stop Milo from destroying a pistachio plant, they inadvertently affect the future. The pistachio plants survive, become sentient, and take over the planet

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. When Mom is out of Doonkelberries for her famous Doonkelberry pie, the boys rush out to find some for her. Then, the visiting French Fireside girls help Isabella capture an American Grizzly Bear, one of the world's most dangerous creatures

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace has to cover for Phineas and Ferb when Jeremy joins in their game of jet-pack volleyball. The boys build a flying saucer to find out how crop circles are made

programme.title: Walk the Prank
programme.desc: Chance is invited to Gross Gordy's birthday party, where he discovers that Gordy is just as quirky at home as he is in school

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels
